name: ‘Instant’ Kimchi With Greens and Bean Sprouts
description: Instant kimchi requires no fermentation and is ready to use as soon as it is seasoned. It makes a fresh salad-like accompaniment for meat or fish dishes, whether Korean or western.
keywords: fish sauce, gochujang, mustard greens, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon Korean anchovy sauce or other fish sauce
1 teaspoon Korean red pepper paste (gochujang), thinned with 1 teaspoon water
6 ounces tender mustard greens or spinach, cut in 1-inch ribbons
Pinch of sea salt or kosher salt

recipeInstructions.text: Put anchovy sauce, sesame oil, sugar, garlic, ginger, gochugaru and gochujang in a salad bowl and stir together.
Add bean sprouts and greens and sprinkle lightly with sea salt. Toss well with fingers, massaging seasoning into vegetables to coat well.
Leave mixture to temper for 5 minutes and transfer to a serving bowl.
